src_original: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha dvipadānāmagryam,  dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha virāgāṇāmagryam,  saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha gaṇānāmagryamiti/
tgt_original: 應作是言： 『歸依佛兩足尊，歸依法離欲尊，歸依僧眾中尊。

src_original: 120.016. atha sa devaputrastiryagyonyupapattibhayabhīto maraṇabhayabhītaśca śakraṃ devānāmindramidamavocat--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam,
tgt_original: 』」時彼嗟𮧬曩法天子，以死怖故，畏傍生故，白帝釋言： 「憍尸迦！

src_original: dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi virāgāṇāmagryam,  saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi gaṇānāmagryam/
tgt_original: 我今歸依佛兩足尊，歸依法離欲尊，歸依僧眾中尊。

src_original: 120.019. atha sa devaputrastriśaraṇaparigṛhīto bhūtvā cyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ//
tgt_original: 」時彼天子，受三歸已，心不間斷，以至命終。

src_original: 120.021. dharmatā khalu adhastāddevānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate nordhvam/
tgt_original: 諸天之法，下智有見，不能觀上。

src_original: 120.021. atha śakro devānāmindrastaṃ devaputramavalokayati--kimasau devaputraḥ sūkarikāyāḥ kukṣau upapanno na veti/  120.023. narakeṣūpapanna iti paśyati/
tgt_original: 時帝釋天主，觀彼天子生於何處，為生南閻浮提王舍大城受猪身耶，為不受猪身？
又觀傍生、鬼界，亦復不見； 又觀娑訶世界人間，亦復不見；
乃至四大王眾天，及忉利天，盡彼觀察，都不能見。
